column9: comment:"please dont buy. it has no double swing function. dawlance is saying there is only one model. dont understand why my model has no dual swing.\nmain problem is that its fan stopped whenever it tripped. causing bad atmosphere and embarrassment in front of guests. may be design fault. i will go for refund if this issue will not be fixed in such expensive unit"}
